org.activiti.workflow.simple.definition

类 ChoiceStepsDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.activiti.workflow.simple.definition.AbstractConditionStepListContainer<ChoiceStepsDefinition>
      • org.activiti.workflow.simple.definition.ChoiceStepsDefinition
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ConditionStepListContainer<ChoiceStepsDefinition>, StepDefinition

    public class ChoiceStepsDefinition
extends AbstractConditionStepListContainer<ChoiceStepsDefinition>
implements StepDefinition
    Defines a block of steps of which one collection of steps is executed based on conditions.
    作者:
    Tijs Rademakers
